item.title: Global Unrest Ushers in New Crises of Representation: Assessing the Present and Future of Area Studies
item.dc:creator: barazaonline
item.description: The global wave of protests presently underway has ushered in a new crisis in the interdisciplinary field of area studies. The Arab Spring in particular has sounded an alarming wake-up call, leading many to challenge the relevance of modalities and methods currently employed within area studies.
